text: Bradley Cooper (born 1975) is an American actor and filmmaker. Bradley Cooper or Brad Cooper may also refer to: *Bradley Cooper (athlete) (born 1957), Bahamanian discus thrower *Brad Cooper (born 1954), Australian swimmer *B. Cooper or Brad Cooper (born 1984), American rapper *Brad Cooper (born 1959), Australian businessman who played a central role in the collapse of HIH Insurance
title: Bradley Cooper (disambiguation)
